means: 巯（基）嘌呤（尤指6-巯基嘌呤，用以治疗急性白血病）

sentence.Network_en: These patients also were receiving drugs known as azathioprine or 6 - mercaptopurine.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些患者同时接受了硫唑嘌呤或巯基嘌呤治疗.

sentence.Network_en: FDA approves methotrexate, an anti - metabolite derived from folic acid, and 6 - mercaptopurine as anti - cancer drugs.
sentence.Network_cn: FDA批准叶酸衍化的 抗 代谢药甲氨蝶呤和 6- 巯基嘌呤作为抗癌药物.

means.word_mean: 1. a drug (trade name Purinethol) that interferes with the metabolism of purine and is used to treat acute lymphocytic leukemia
